ISSUE.TITLE: Mounting error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: 1. What is this problem in mounting section, please help...?: [INFO] Setting up Dynamic Analysis Environment [INFO] Starting Web Proxy [INFO] Started Web Proxy at 192.168.56.1:1337 [INFO] Starting App for Dynamic Analysis [INFO] Getting ADB Location - daemon not running. starting it now on port 5037 * - daemon started successfully * [INFO] ADB Started [INFO] Waiting for 5 seconds... [INFO] Connecting to VM/Device connected to 192.168.56.101:5555 **[INFO] Mounting su: invalid option -- o Usage: su [options] [--] [-] [LOGIN] [--] [args...] Options: --daemon start the su daemon agent -c, --command COMMAND pass COMMAND to the invoked shell -h, --help display this help message and exit -, -l, --login pretend the shell to be a login shell -m, -p, --preserve-environment do not change environment variables -s, --shell SHELL use SHELL instead of the default /system/bin/sh -u display the multiuser mode and exit -v, --version display version number and exit -V display version code and exit, this is used almost exclusively by Superuser.apk mount: Operation not permitted** [INFO] Installing APK 4393 KB/s (10348322 bytes in 2.300s) pkg: /data/local/tmp/d78af39354ad282c6998f6fdeb8dd168.apk Success [INFO] Launching APK Main Activity Starting: Intent { cmp=com.siauliu.bankas.mobile/com.etronika.cpyellow.StartupActivity } [INFO] Testing Environment is Ready! [INFO] Getting Screen Resolution [INFO] Getting ADB Location [03/Jun/2016 13:13:37]"POST /GetEnv/ HTTP/1.1" 200 64 [INFO] Getting ADB Location [INFO] Installing MobSF RootCA 23 KB/s (1119 bytes in 0.046s) **Unknown id: /data/local/tmp/0025aabb.0** [03/Jun/2016 13:13:38]"POST /MobSFCA/ HTTP/1.1" 200 19 1. and also, is it OK **Unknown id: /data/local/tmp/0025aabb.0** ? after that screen looks like that ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/16913780/15776178/c4484bd0-298e-11e6-8927-c996a9708e44.png) and in my app on virtual box i can't login to app, no internet access, no access to server. ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/16913780/15776235/0dd473b4-298f-11e6-99f3-669fff80d771.png) Please help :( Big thanks. Paulius
